p: Several studies point out distinct antioxidants in variable amounts in taro and taro derivatives and these differences might be attributed to multiple factors, such as ( i) genetic background between variants of the same species; ( ii) the applied farming cultivation system; ( iii) post-harvest processing, including the handling, cutting, peeling, drying, cooking, and storage stages; and ( iv) non-standard extraction of bioactivities [ 84, 85, 86, 87, 88, 89].
